lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The January/February employment statistics suggest the Gross National Product will show a healthy rate of growth for the first three months of this year, said Lyle Gramley, an economist with the Mortgage Bankers Association.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Some of the slowness experienced in the October-December period had been expected to spill over into the first quarter this year, as the tax law changes that went into effect in January slowed business and consumer spending.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The report showed a rising volume of exports corresponding to a decline in imports despite the fact that in current dollar terms, the U.
